thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Can't beat it for location and value for money
thread.title_full: Can't beat it for location and value for money - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NannyCat
title: Can't beat it for location and value for money
text:
Second stay at the Wellington and I wouldn't stay anywhere else - unless I win the lottery !
Clean, spacious room and bathroom, two comfy queen size beds (and I mean comfy - better than my bed at home !!) friendly staff, diner and restaurant on site, conveniently located - subway entrance right outside the door, walking distance Central Park, Times Square, 5th Ave, Rockefeller Centre, theatres, restaurants. What's not to like?
